The most important art news

Artistic paintings

A painting is an image that a plastic arts painter paints on a smooth white surface of burlap or linen. The concept of painting paintings evolved further with the development of the tools and methods of oil painting, especially between the fifteenth and sixteenth centuries in Europe. Among the most famous paintings is the Mona Lisa by the Italian artist Leonardo Da Vinci, and among the famous contemporary paintings is the painting of the Scream by the Norwegian painter Edvart Munk.

Read More

Art galleries

A hall or group of halls in which artists display their productions. Art galleries in art galleries to galleries History tells us that many of the Italian artists of the seventeenth century gave the public the opportunity to study their works and buy them through the establishment of art galleries in Venice and elsewhere, and that it was the custom of the noble Italian families in that century to present to the public some of their masterpieces during periods of time. Specific. Today, galleries are the only path of fame for aspiring artists.
